attributes.action: Allow greater funding to the NHS
attributes.background: Within the next year, the NHS is projected to receive cuts exceeding 40 million pounds, following a 4 year trend, as a society we must influence change. The undoubtedly crucial service the NHS provides to each and everyone of the citizens within our nation, will be put under immense jeopardy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for a specific increase to NHS funding.
